publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1235 Angus MacKay: The Regulation of Investigatory Powers (Notification of Authorisations etc.) (Scotland) Order 2000-That the Justice and Home Affairs Committee recommends that the Regulation of Investigatory Powers (Notification of Authorisations etc.) (Scotland) Order 2000 be approved.

S1M-1235 Angus MacKay: The Regulation of Investigatory Powers (Notification of Authorisations etc.) (Scotland) Order 2000—That the Justice and Home Affairs Committee recommends that the Regulation of Investigatory Powers (Notification of Authorisations etc.) (Scotland) Order 2000 be approved.
S1M-1235 The Regulation of Investigatory Powers (Notification of Authorisations etc.) (Scotland) Order 2000 (lodged on 3 October 2000) Iain Gray*
